label: financial_irregularity_02_ep_010
content:

### Headcount

### Auditor Notes

- Revenue from new distributor Apex Industrial: $4.1M, standard terms

### Events
- Q4 sales push: pipeline acceleration program announced
- Distributor conference: 22 partners attended
- Warehouse lease signed: 40,000 sq ft, Cincinnati
- Engineering headcount: 3 positions approved above plan

### Notes
- October close: channel partner onboarding activity. Credit limit adjustments processed per approval matrix.
